Basic Examples

Metronic Dropdown component allows to build rubost dropdown menus:
Dropdown
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
  • Quick Actions
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Cancel

  • Quick Actions

  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Cancel
Dropdowns can be toggled via click or hover by setting data-dropdown-toggle="hover" and data-dropdown-toggle="click" :
Dropdown - Hover
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdown - Click
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdowns can be shown persistent when toggled by click to avoid closing on mouse click on it data-dropdown-persistent="true" :
Dropdown - Persistent
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout

Advance Examples

Dropdowns can be aligned to left , center and right :
Dropdown - Left
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdown - Right
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdown - Center
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdowns support small , medium , large and huge sizes:
Dropdown - Default
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdown - Small
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdown - Medium
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdown - Large
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdown - Huge
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Apply m-dropdown--up to display dropdown in opposite mode:
Dropdown - Default
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
To display dropdowns without arrow just remove the arrow element from the HTML markup:
Dropdown - No arrow
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropup - No arrow
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdowns can contain scrollable long contents:
Dropdown - Scrollable
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Section
  • Activity
  • Messages
  • FAQ
  • Support
  • Logout
Dropdowns can contain free content such as text, elements or components:
Dropdown - Free content
